functions.name: Label (component)
functions.signature: const Label = React.forwardRef<ElementRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root>, ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof LabelPrimitive.Root> & VariantProps<typeof labelVariants>>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => JSX.Element)
functions.description: Styled wrapper around @radix-ui/react-label. Uses class-variance-authority to define variants and `cn` utility to compose classes. Forwards ref and preserves Radix label behaviour.

notes: Simple presentational wrapper centralizing label styling and consistent variant handling.
